article.title: Linderman Appointed to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense (Acquisition

article.text: Richard W. Linderman has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy director, information systems and cybersecurity, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
